forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 83. Southeast wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 64. Southeast wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Boston today, the atmosphere unfolds with a gentle touch of warmth, inviting residents to step outside and savor the fleeting pleasures of a summer day. The sun flirts playfully with clouds, casting soft shadows on the vibrant city. A mild breeze, barely a whisper from the southeast, carries the promise of a humid afternoon, with temperatures pushing toward a comfortable 83 degrees. There’s a charm to the hazy backdrop, where distant landscapes soften under a thin veil that hints at approaching fog anticipated after twilight. 

As evening descends, the fog will weave its way into the urban tapestry, creating a tranquil ambiance perfect for gentle strolls along the Charles River or quiet moments spent at local cafés, breathing in the heady mix of fresh coffee and the echo of distant laughter. For those venturing out, a light layer will suffice – perhaps a breezy linen shirt or a comfortable wrap, anticipating the cool embrace of nightfall. This blend of sun, cloud, and emerging fog promises an enchanting evening, beckoning one to explore the hidden corners of the city or simply linger on a porch with a good book in hand, embracing the soothing rhythm of the world.
